code:
---
title: Easy Park Plus - Customer Account State Diagram (Groupware_KanbanBoard)
---

stateDiagram-v2
    [Groupware_WikiPage] --> Registered : Account created
    Registered --> Active : Email/identity verified
    Active --> Suspended : Policy violation or payment issue
    Active --> Deactivated : User-initiated or admin action
    Suspended --> Active : Issue resolved
    Suspended --> Deactivated : User or admin action
    Deactivated --> [Groupware_SprintBacklog]
    note right of Suspended
        Account access is restricted
    end note
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 首先，我们需要定义流程的起点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，Generic Diagram的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 最终，我们在Generic Diagram完成整个流程。
